General.Name: Shandong Gold Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Gold Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the exploration, mining, processing, smelting, and selling of gold and silver ores in the People's Republic of China. It is involved in refining, processing, production, and sales of gold products; production of special equipment for gold mines and building decoration materials; investing in equity funds; trading of gold bullion; and provision of brokerage services for trading of futures contracts, as well as production of standard gold ingots, investment gold bars, and silver ingots. The company also engages in the consulting and investigation, basic geological survey, management consulting, and asset and investment management activities. In addition, it produces silver, copper, lead, and zinc metals, as well as iron concentrates. Shandong Gold Mining Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.
